sentences.sContent: The industrial revolution, which started a couple of hundred years ago in Europe, is now spreading across the world.
sentences.sCn: 几百年前始于欧洲的工业革命现在正向全世界扩散。

sentences.sContent: ...and later spread to Europe before crossing over to sub-Saharan Africa...
...But frequently untreated human waste harvested from lavatories is delivered to farms and spread as fertilizer...
...there has been a rapid spread of ecolabeling...
...rural communities are bypassing the wires and wooden poles that spread power...
...it's easy to lose sight of their primary mission: to produce and spread knowledge...
...tea and porcelain had also been spread all over the world through it...
...In an effort to spread awareness to teens across the nation...

synos.tran: 传播，散布；展开；伸展；铺开

phrases.pCn: 火蔓延，火焰蔓延；火势蔓延
扩展频谱通信，扩频通信
火焰传播；火焰蔓延；展焰性
能量扩展度；能量散布；能量分散
买卖价差；递盘虚盘差价
棋盘式对照表，总分析表

words.tran: [建] 撒布机；散布者；推广者

trans.tranOther: if something spreads or is spread, it becomes larger or moves so that it affects more people or a larger area
